message:
amader sadhinotar history te kothao "secularism" er kotha chilo na, 6 dofa, 11 dofa, 1970 election er manifesto, historical speech of 7 march, sadhinotar ghosona potro etc kothao kintu secularism er kotha nai,,,, amader sadhinotar j koiti mul montro chilo tar moddhe onnotomo holo-
1. democracy,,
2. no-communal society
amader bujte hobe- osamprodaekota and dhormoniropekkhota ekjinisna... dhormoniropekkho ta kokhono Islam support kore na, but osamprodaekota holo islam er onnotomo ekti dabi..........
aj deshe ek srenir manush secularism nie khub matha gamasse ei bole je eta amader muktijuddher chetona, tara ekdike jemon muktijuddher chetonar vul explanation disse, onno dike mukti juddher prodhan karon - democracy nie kono kotha bolse na.... aj amader deshe sob theke boro je songkot ta holo- democracy r songkot... aj gonotontro biponno, othocho ei lok gulo gonotontrer kotha na bole, muktijuddho ke Islam prio manusher protipokkho hisabe dar korar opochesta chalasse.......
aj ke jara osamprodaek cheto na ke dhormoniropekkhotar sathe gulie feslse tara ashole eta bad intention theke e kortese,, ei lok gulo ashole amader jatigoto oikko nosto kore ekta bived lagie rakhte chay jate amra kokhono e unnotir dike dhabito hote na pari,,,,, muktijudder chetonar name jara aj Islam ke muktijuddher against e dar koriese tara kokhono e ei desher o desher manusher valo chay na,, tara Bangaldesh ke ekta tabedar rastro banie rakhte chay..............
------------KHAN
